descriptionHtml:
Did you ever heard of this greek myth creature called Medusa?
With snakes instead of hair, and this special glimpse/look which transforms her enemys into STONE??
Well....now you can do this either !!!
Instead of the name Medusa i took the Cassiopaia one because of playin too much league of legends last time......lol

Cassiopaias Curse is the ultimate Spell for transforming one, two, three,or maybe.....100 enemys at once into stone by just 1 time casting.
The Wave effect is taken from the unrelenting voice power, and everything or everyone who gets in contact with this wave is turned into a massive block of stone.

A very fun Spell Mod for everyone who wants to turn its enemys into a great Statue...like a trophy or somethin like that....or just turning a lively tower into a spooky town of stoned people ....yeah awesome

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Spell costs 1000 mana to cast.
The Spell takes 999 days to end ( so...likely forever)
Its a Spell casted by both hands.
The Casting time is set to 0 so you can spam it until your finger drops off your hand.

Simple ID search by opening the console, type in \"Cassio\" or \"Cassiopaia\" or just \"Curse\"

Spell ID = 91000d64

Or just type player.addspell 91000d64

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Instalation:
- Download it
- put the esp file into your Skyrim Data folder
- enable the esp file (Cassiopaias Curse) at the Skyrim Launcher -> Data Files section
- Play the game

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Recommends:
Skyrim 1.8

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Have Fun Guys, and endorse if you want to, i would also like critics on the comment section
author: PeteMaravich123
